title_screen module¶

class title_screen.Title_Screen(images, font)¶

Bases: scene.Scene

Provides a menu for UI.

Parameters:
  • images – Will get passed to Game constructor.
  • font – Which font to render opt_surfs in.
blit_opt(opt_surf, y)¶

Blits a single opt_surf to self.image and returns a Rect of the effected area.

Parameters:
  • opt_surf – The option to be displayed.
  • y – The y coordinate to put the option on.
blit_opts()¶

Blits multiple opts by calling self.blit_opt on each opt.

make_opt_surf(opt, font_col=(70, 0, 6))¶

Returns a new surface using the font passed into the constructor.

Parameters:
  • opt – The option to be displayed.
  • font_col – The surface to display the option on.
make_opt_surfs()¶

Returns a list of surfaces from the opts passed into the constructor

process_input(events)¶

Handles input from the user.

Parameters:events – The events to be handled.
update(display, events)¶

Updates self and processes user input.

Parameters:
  • display – The game display.
  • events – The events to be handled.
